description: Mobile techniques used by SpyDealer, ATT&CK software S0324 v1.1
name: SpyDealer (S0324)

techniques.comment: SpyDealer abuses Android Accessibility features to steal messages from popular apps such as WeChat, Skype, Viber, and QQ.
SpyDealer harvests phone call history from victims..
SpyDealer harvests contact lists from victims.
SpyDealer exfiltrates data from over 40 apps such as WeChat, Facebook, WhatsApp, Skype, and others.
SpyDealer enables remote control of the victim through SMS channels.
SpyDealer registers the broadcast receiver to listen for events related to device boot-up.
SpyDealer harvests SMS and MMS messages from victims..
SpyDealer downloads and executes root exploits from a remote server.
SpyDealer uses the commercial rooting app Baidu Easy Root to gain root privilege and maintain persistence on the victim.
SpyDealer harvests location data from victims..
SpyDealer can record phone calls and surrounding audio and video, as well as take photos via front and rear cameras.
SpyDealer maintains persistence by installing an Android application package (APK) on the system partition.
SpyDealer harvests phone number IMEI, and IMSI.
